@Injections.Citation: "...injections in the rostral and dorsal superior parietal lobule (...area PE)..."
"...inn case 10 the injection was...restricted to areas PGm and PEci."

"Cases 11-13 received isotope injections in the rostralmost portion of the inferior parietal lobule (area PF and rostral PFG). The injections also encroached upon the lower bank of the rostral tip of the intraparietal sulcus (area 2)."

"The injection in case 14 was situated...in the midinferior parietal lobule (area PFG and rostral area PG) and avoided both the lower bank of the intraparietal sulcus and the upper bank of the Sylvian fissure."
"...injection of the mid-inferior parietal lobule which extended into the parietal operculum (area PFop and PGop)."

"Case 16 was also situated at the level of the mid-inferior parietal lobule, but this injection involved both the lower rim of the intraparietal sulcus and a portion of the lower bank, including area POa."

"There were five monkeys with injections of the caudal inferior parietal lobule (caudal area PG and area Opt...). The injection site in case 18 extended from the lower lip of the intraparietal sulcus to the upper bank of the superior temporal sulcus."

"There were five monkeys with injections of the caudal inferior parietal lobule (caudal area PG and area Opt...)...Injections restricted to the ventral sector of the caudal inferior parietal lobule...which included, in case 21, a portion of the upper bank of the superior temporal sulcus..."
"There were five monkeys with injections of the caudal inferior parietal lobule (caudal area PG and area Opt...)...injection of the dorsal sector of the caudal inferior parietal lobule (case 22)..."
"...injections...in the caudalmost segment of the cingulate sulcus...(...area PEci)"
"Case 4 had an injection in the ventralmost portion of the rostral superior parietal lobule (area PE)."
"In case 5, the injection straddled the upper lip of the intraparietal sulcus and involved both areas PEc and PEa."
"The injection in case 8...principally affecting area PEc with relatively little involvement of area PEa within the intraparietal sulcus."
"In case 9, the injection involved the caudalmost sector of area PEc as well as areas PGm and PEci..."

publication.title: Posterior parietal projections to the intraparietal sulcus of the rhesus monkey
